### Amended Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title** (English): Accommodations for Ukrainian Nationals
* **Solicitation Title** (French): Hébergements pour les ressortissants ukrainiens
* **Reference Number**: WS3636437820-Doc3637818858
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: 26 August 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 20 September 2022, 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: 20 September 2022

#### Description of Requirements

The Department of Citizenship & Immigration (IRCC) invites bidders to provide temporary hotel accommodations services in cities across Canada from 11 October 2022 to 31 March 2023, with potential option periods. This requirement does not include any security-related requirements.

The solicitation includes two UN SPSC codes: 90111600 and 90111800, which refer to meeting facilities and hotel rooms, respectively. The basis of selection for this solicitation is the lowest evaluated price.

#### Additional Details

This solicitation is governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

All interested bidders must refer to the solicitation documents, including Annex A – Statement of Requirements and Annex E – Mandatory Requirements – for detailed information and instructions. It is bidders' responsibility to ensure that their submissions comply with all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.

*Note: The original tender closing date and time have been modified. Bidders must submit their required supporting documentation and bid submissions by 14:00 EST on 20 September 2022. Any bids received after 14:00 EST on the tender closing date will be declared non-responsive.*
